name: Azusa Nakano (K-ON!) LoRA
description: I continue to make LoRA with characters from the anime K-ON! First was Mio, and now it's Azusa's turn. Use weights from 0.3 to 0.8. To repeat her clothes and uniforms, see the prompts attached to the example images.
